Commands

PoroWord

A League of Legends Discord bot for guessing match outcomes with friends.

Getting Started â†’

Near Real-Time Match Notification

PoroWord sends a notification to a designated text channel whenever a player starts a game!

Guess Match Outcomes

Place your bets on which team will win at the start of the game using coins. If you guessed it right, you get to split the coin pool!

Bonus Questions

A bonus question will be asked every time a match starts. The question might be about game length, KDA of a summoner, or some other game-related facts. Whoever gets the closest guess earns some coins!

Made by Legendword. This bot is not affiliated with Riot Games in any way.
